title: Where's my essence collector ward?!
body:
Hello guys,
I've bought the Essence Collector Ward for 5k BE the first day of the Essence shop. Since then, I've been using it.
Today, I've entered a Normal Draft queue, the ward completely disappeared.

Any suggestions? Thanks

{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Hey, I looked into this for you and happy to say it's still on your account.  I dug for some info and it looks like there's an issue with today's patch causing some players to not see their Essence Collector Ward.  Interested teams are aware of the issue, but no ETA on a fix.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eV2OGEJP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-06T16:48:17.249+0000)
>
> Hey, I looked into this for you and happy to say it's still on your account.  I dug for some info and it looks like there's an issue with today's patch causing some players to not see their Essence Collector Ward.  Interested teams are aware of the issue, but no ETA on a fix.  Hang tight!

Hey, it's been about a week. Do you have any news on that front? It's okay if it takes forever, I just want to make sure the fix hasn't already gone out, and just didn't effect some of us.

Edit: Ah! Found news.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/oaIwekAj-hey-riot-wheres-my-essence-collector-ward?comment=0000
Hey VVry, no updates yet.  It's a known issue but I don't have an ETA currently.

Thank you very much for a timely reply, right as I found Bro talking about it too! Everyone just can't see it, it'll appear again soonish.

We appreciate your time and effort in keeping the peace, thank you.
Same here, OCE
Thank you very much for addressing this. It was lovely to find this explanation, and not have to worry anymore.
Thank you for responding! I'm having the same issue so I appreciate you letting us know it's being taken care of!
I also have the same problem in EUW.
I've got the same problem
Same problem on EUW, please fix, it's the ward I always use
I was just about to write the same exact post! I hope it comes back soon, (fav ward skin)
Same here, NA.
same i was about to sent a ticket to riot games saying my essence collector ward is not showing lol, hope they fix it soon
Same here, in EUW.

Same thing happened to me :( 

It was my favorite ward skin too.

Same. will it come back?
and it's still on my purchase history.
Same, even checked my purchase history to make sure and it's still on there

Same....
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I'm also having the same problem on NA server :c
Having the same problem.
Same probleme here
